rules_text:
Vigilance
When Livestock Guardian enters, you may sacrifice a token. When you do, exile target creature an opponent controls until Livestock Guardian leaves the battlefield.
notes:
Functional reprint of Shire Shirriff — Replaced Goat Herder

I like Goat Herder, but we’ve got a number of cards that make a token on enters the battlefield, and I wanted to open up the slot for a different effect, especially with uncommon slots as tight as they are.
